name: Study Notes by Steve
body:
_This page is keeping to update as my study on Deep Learning techniques._

##List of Recurrent Neural Networks (RNN)##
###LSTMs###
1. [Understanding LSTM Networks](http://colah.github.io/posts/2015-08-Understanding-LSTMs/)

> This blog is pretty good for beginners to learn the Long Short-Term Memory Networks (LSTMs), which is a famous type of RNN. There is little mathematics except for couple of basic equations for the gates and layers. In addition, in the end of this article, it provides couple of most recent papers using LSTMs, which are really worth to read.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
